tasks.title: Add comprehensive unit tests for parallel execution
tasks.description: The parallel execution code in internal/loop/loop.go (runParallelBasic, executeTasksParallel) lacks dedicated unit tests. Add tests for concurrent task execution, semaphore handling, fail-fast behavior, and error collection.

tasks.title: Add integration tests for plugin system
tasks.description: The plugin system (internal/plugin/) has validation but no end-to-end integration tests. Add tests covering plugin discovery, loading, manifest parsing, and JSON-RPC execution.

tasks.title: Implement proper error logging in plugin loader
tasks.description: internal/plugin/loader.go line 129 has a TODO comment for proper logging. Replace the silent continue with actual error logging when plugin discovery fails.

tasks.title: Add error logging in plugin agent registration
tasks.description: internal/agents/plugin_agent.go line 193 has a TODO comment for proper logging. Add error logging when agent plugin registration fails during LoadAndRegisterAgentPlugins.

tasks.title: Complete plugin configuration environment variable passing
tasks.description: internal/plugin/executor.go line 172 has a TODO for passing plugin configuration as environment variables. Implement this feature to allow plugins to receive their configuration via env vars.

tasks.title: Add timeout configuration to plugin settings
tasks.description: Plugin timeout handling exists but is not configurable via looper.toml. The PluginSettings struct has a Timeout field but it is not documented or exposed in the config example.

tasks.title: Improve multi-agent consensus result handling
tasks.description: internal/parallel/executor.go executeMultiple() uses only the first successful result (line 119). Implement proper consensus logic like voting, merging, or conflict resolution.

tasks.title: Add integration test for looper-live-test skill
tasks.description: skills/looper-live-test/SKILL.md defines a live test skill but there is no automated verification that it works. Add an integration test or CI check.

tasks.title: Document security model for plugin capabilities
tasks.description: Plugin capabilities system exists (can_execute_commands, can_access_network, etc.) but the README only warns about them. Add a SECURITY.md section explaining the threat model and sandboxing limitations.

tasks.title: Fix potential data race in schema cache
tasks.description: internal/todo/types.go getCachedSchema uses double-checked locking but the pattern has subtle issues. Consider using sync.Once or a more robust caching pattern.

tasks.title: Add validation for workflow configuration sections
tasks.description: Config parsing accepts any [workflows.*] section without validation. Add validation to warn about unknown workflow configurations or typos in workflow names.

tasks.title: Implement graceful shutdown for running plugins
tasks.description: Plugin executor (internal/plugin/executor.go) does not handle context cancellation gracefully for long-running plugins. Add proper cleanup and timeout handling.

tasks.title: Add health check endpoint for plugin discovery
tasks.description: Plugin discovery is silent on failures. Add a --verbose flag or doctor command that reports which plugins failed to load and why.

tasks.title: Standardize error messages across plugin commands
tasks.description: Plugin error messages use inconsistent formats. Create a centralized error formatting utility for user-facing plugin errors.

tasks.title: Review completed: no critical issues found
tasks.description: Senior developer review completed. Code is well-organized with good separation of concerns. Plugin system architecture is solid. Found minor improvements around testing, logging, and documentation.
tasks.details: Review found 14 improvement tasks but no blocking issues. Codebase is production-ready with minor polish needed.
